abstract.p: Chiasso turns recycled tires into witty doormats (S)

block.p: Destination Doormats, round welcome mats introduced last month by the home-furnishings retailer Chiasso, do more than just make a statement. They are made of recycled tires, so they are also environmentally friendly.

The doormats come in two designs. One, a bright red bull's-eye, has the slogan ''You Are Here'' across the center. The other depicts a city manhole cover. (Available cities include New York, above, Chicago and Paris; there is also a generic version that reads ''Metro Sewer.'') The doormats, which are 24 inches in diameter and cost $28, are available at chiasso.com or (877) 244-2776.
